subject: [R] PlotDemo.java for Rserve?
body:
Does anyone know where I can obtain DemoPlot.java from. I want to use it to
find out how implement something in Java in conjunction with Rserve.

Cheers
-- 
View this message in context: http://www.nabble.com/PlotDemo.java-for-Rserve--tf3812255.html#a10790967
Sent from the R help mailing list archive at Nabble.com.

PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
